doc.title: Hailey Takes Control
doc.plot: Hailey Takes Control. This is a feminization fetish movie that involves 2 girls feminizing a man. If feminization is not your fetish, than this is not the movie for you. If it is your fetish, you will enjoy it! Our movie starts with Shawn and Brittiany fight for the affections of Hailey Young. After a busy day of shopping Hailey and Brittiany return home. As they begin to hem a dress, Hailey punishes Brittiany for being a bad girl. As the fun begins, Shawn returns home to catch the girls playing each other. The girls catch Shawn watching and decide he deserves a punishment also. Hailey takes control over Shawn forcing him to the ground. Once she has control over Shawn, she, with the help of Brittiany, turns him into a girl. This movie is feminization fetish erotica. People who enjoy this fetish will love this movie.
